title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4D.31 - Flashing Operation - Transition Out of Flashing Mode
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4D.31 - Flashing Operation - Transition Out of Flashing Mode

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 03A Pre-planned automatic changes from flashing to
stop-and-go operation should be made at the beginning of the artery green
interval where practicable, preferably at the beginning of the common green
interval (i.e. when a green indication is shown in both directions on the
artery). Pre-planned automatic changes from stop-and-go to flashing operation
should be made at the end of the common artery red interval where practicable
(i.e. when a red indication is shown in both directions on the
artery). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
4D.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
